commit message: * Fixed authentication issue with qBittorrent version 3.2.0
* Fixed Resume all and pause all in qBittorrent v3.2.0
* Added SwipeRefresh when launching the app. Also when selecting an option on the drawer menu
* Added remove of toolbar title in torrent details for phone view
* Added toolbar title when performing an action (pause, resume, etc)

Release 4.0.0

* Google Material Design adaptation
* Fixed resume all nd pause all actions
* Fixed header info in phone view
* Fixed header info not showing after a command in phone view

* Code rearrenged in odert to unify MainActivity.java
* Unified ItemFragment.java
* Verified code for TorrentDetailsFragment. Not yet unified!

* Code rearrenged in odert to unify TorrentDetailsFragment.java
*  Fixed activity_main.xml and torrent_details.xml for Google Material Design

* Fixed autoscroll when updating torrent details (disable listview focus in scrollview)
* Torrent details adaptation for Google Materia Desing
* TorrentDetails.java modified to unify free & pro versions

* Modified timeout defaults for flawless connections
* Fixed refresh behaviour
* Fixed authentication errors
* Fixed icon behavior in toolbar when pressing back button
* Google Material Design adaptation for free version
* Fixed contextual bar to show more actions
* TorrentDetails.java unified
* Fixed swipe refresh issues for tablet in fre version
* Fixed dark theme for tablets in free version
* Fixed dark theme for tablets in free version
* Fixed dark theme for tablets in free version
